Ashes of Outland.name: Aldor Attendant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost_of your Librams by_(1) this game.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

Ashes of Outland.name: Blackjack Stunner
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, return a minion to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

Ashes of Outland.name: Crimson Sigil Runner
Ashes of Outland.text: Outcast: Draw a card.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ethereal Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Spell Damage +1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: According to him, undamaged minions just spell problems.

Ashes of Outland.name: Evocation
Ashes of Outland.text:
Fill your hand with random Mage spells.
At the end of your turn, discard them.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

Ashes of Outland.name: Font of Power
Ashes of Outland.text: Discover a Mage minion. If your deck has no minions, keep all 3.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It's Comic Sans.

Ashes of Outland.name: Guardian Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Helboar
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Beasts love Helbacon Strips!

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Gan'arg
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, equip a 3/2 Axe.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Factory Direct Fiery War Axe. Please allow two turns for delivery.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Homunculus
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. Taunt
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Sungill
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, summon two 1/1 Murlocs.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

Ashes of Outland.name: Infectious Sporeling
Ashes of Outland.text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious_Sporeling.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

Ashes of Outland.name: Reliquary of Souls
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Reliquary Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

Ashes of Outland.name: Renew
Ashes of Outland.text: Restore #3 Health. Discover a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

Ashes of Outland.name: Rocket Augmerchant
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Rush.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Don't worry, this won't hurt me a bit."

Ashes of Outland.name: Shadow Council
Ashes of Outland.text:
Replace your hand
with random Demons.
Give them +2/+2.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Why is everybody in Outland replacing their hands?!

Ashes of Outland.name: Soulbound Ashtongue
Ashes of Outland.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He claims to be "soulbound," but I just think he's clingy.

Ashes of Outland.name: Spymistress
Ashes of Outland.text: Stealth
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Spies in Outland must blend into the environment. That means hot-pink gear and bright green hair. It’s a weird place.

Ashes of Outland.name: Sword and Board
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Gain 2 Armor.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Stab and Slab. Charge and Targe. Slash and Bash. You get the idea.

Ashes of Outland.name: Unstable Felbolt
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy minion and a random friendly one.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Warning! Your minions are seated in the splash zone.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ambush
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 2/3 Ambusher with Poisonous.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

Ashes of Outland.name: Apexis Smuggler
Ashes of Outland.text: After you play a Secret, Discover a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "S-secrets? I don't have any! Whoa, look, a spell!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Ashtongue Slayer
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +3 Attack and Immune this turn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Her other hand attachments include a corkscrew and a bottle opener.

Ashes of Outland.name: Astromancer Solarian
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Solarian Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

Ashes of Outland.name: Bamboozle
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, transform it into a random one that costs (3) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Bonechewer Brawler
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion takes _damage, gain +2 Attack.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

Ashes of Outland.name: Corsair Cache
Ashes of Outland.text:
Draw a weapon.
Give it +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

Ashes of Outland.name: Dirty Tricks
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, draw 2 cards.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

Ashes of Outland.name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

Ashes of Outland.name: Furious Felfin
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Signature moves include Eye Bream, Feast of Soles, and Metamorphofish.

Ashes of Outland.name: Hand of A'dal
Ashes of Outland.text:
Give a minion +2/+1.
Draw a card.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

Ashes of Outland.name: Immolation Aura
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Felmaw
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, __attack a random enemy.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It doesn't care who woke it up, someone's getting bitten.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Vilefiend
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. Rush
Ashes of Outland.flavor: If you do the time, you gotta make up the time.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ironbark
Ashes of Outland.text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt. Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Your Demons cost (1) less. Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kanrethad Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

Ashes of Outland.name: Libram of Wisdom
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add a 'Libram of Wisdom' spell to your hand."
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The best wisdom is passed on.

Ashes of Outland.name: Mo'arg Artificer
Ashes of Outland.text: All minions take double damage from spells.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Double-damage. You know the drill.

Ashes of Outland.name: Murgur Murgurgle
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Murgurgle Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

Ashes of Outland.name: Netherwalker
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: You got to Nethercrawl before you can Netherwalk.

Ashes of Outland.name: Pack Tactics
Ashes of Outland.text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Rustsworn Initiate
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Impcaster with Spell Damage +1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The Rusted Legion's training leaves a little to be desired. He hasn't even had a tetanus shot yet!

Ashes of Outland.name: Scavenger's Ingenuity
Ashes of Outland.text:
Draw a Beast.
Give it +3/+3.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "A beast, barely alive. Gentlemen, we can rebuild it! Make it stronger, faster... spikier."

Ashes of Outland.name: Sethekk Veilweaver
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
a minion, add a Priest
spell to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The Sethekk weren't able to survive this long by being wasteful with their power. Or their wacky hats.

Ashes of Outland.name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]After you play a Secret, Discover a Secret from a different class.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

Ashes of Outland.name: Spectral Sight
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Draw a card. Outcast: Draw another.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

Ashes of Outland.name: Starscryer
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

Ashes of Outland.name: Akama
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Akama Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

Ashes of Outland.name: Apotheosis
Ashes of Outland.text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

Ashes of Outland.name: Archspore Msshi'fn
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Msshi'fn Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

Ashes of Outland.name: Augmented Porcupine
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal this minion's Attack damage randomly split among all enemies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Pokey-man. Gotta spike 'em all!

Ashes of Outland.name: Bladestorm
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Repeat until one dies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor:
Dear minions: 

Woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh, woosh.

Best regards,
Bladestorm

Ashes of Outland.name: Blistering Rot
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
summon a Rot with stats
equal to this minion's.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bogbeam
Ashes of Outland.text:
Deal $3 damage to_a minion.
Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bogstrok Clacker
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bonechewer Raider
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If there is a damaged minion, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: And if that minion has a frisbee, LOOK OUT!

Ashes of Outland.name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage, this loses
_1 Durability instead.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

Ashes of Outland.name: Darkglare
Ashes of Outland.text: After your hero takes damage, refresh a Mana_Crystal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He's got a dark glare, but he sees crystal clear!

Ashes of Outland.name: Dragonmaw Overseer
Ashes of Outland.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

Ashes of Outland.name: Frozen Shadoweaver
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: She still wears her Frozen Shadoweave set despite the many, many nerfs. She just can't let it go!

Ashes of Outland.name: Fungal Fortunes
Ashes of Outland.text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

Ashes of Outland.name: Greyheart Sage
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Stealthed minion, draw 2 cards.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "What am I drinking again?"

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Observer
Ashes of Outland.text: Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Currently serving two turns on charges of aggravated minion slaughter.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Satyr
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (5).
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "C'mon down to Illhoof's bargain bin! When the satyr's free, he'll lower your fee!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Lady Vashj
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

Ashes of Outland.name: Marshspawn
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, Discover a spell.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

Ashes of Outland.name: Netherwind Portal
Ashes of Outland.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random 4-Cost minion.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: More aromatic than a regular portal.

Ashes of Outland.name: Overconfident Orc
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt While at full Health, this has +2 Attack.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I am da powerful! You are da poop!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Serpentshrine Portal
Ashes of Outland.text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
Ashes of Outland.flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

Ashes of Outland.name: Teron Gorefiend
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Resummon them with +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "You’re fine, friendly minions! You're fine! Don’t tell Mom!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Terrorguard Escapee
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Huntresses for your_opponent.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Poor guy is terrified, look at his faces.

Ashes of Outland.name: Totemic Reflection
Ashes of Outland.text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

Ashes of Outland.name: Underlight Angling Rod
Ashes of Outland.text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Warmaul Challenger
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Battle it to the death!
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Old gladiator rules: first one to die loses.

Ashes of Outland.name: Zixor, Apex Predator
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Zixor Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ashtongue Battlelord
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt Lifesteal
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Demons have destroyed the lives of the Ashtongue draenei. Now he’s got a shoulder-axe to grind.

Ashes of Outland.name: Burrowing Scorpid
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If that kills the target, gain Stealth.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It's a game of hide and go sting.

Ashes of Outland.name: Disguised Wanderer
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He wanders east... always into the east.

Ashes of Outland.name: Felfin Navigator
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

Ashes of Outland.name: Germination
Ashes of Outland.text: Summon a copy of a friendly minion. Give the copy Taunt.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

Ashes of Outland.name: Incanter's Flow
Ashes of Outland.text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by_(1).
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

Ashes of Outland.name: Kargath Bladefist
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Shuffle 'Kargath Prime' into your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

Ashes of Outland.name: Kayn Sunfury
Ashes of Outland.text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore_Taunt.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Magtheridon
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Dormant. Battlecry: Summon three 1/3 enemy Warders. When they die, destroy all minions and awaken.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Came from another world to invade Outland and bend it to his will… only to be overthrown by an elf from another world who invaded Outland and bent it to his will.

Ashes of Outland.name: Maiev Shadowsong
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

Ashes of Outland.name: Metamorphosis
Ashes of Outland.text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 4 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

Ashes of Outland.name: Mok'Nathal Lion
Ashes of Outland.text: Rush. Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Gain a copy of its Deathrattle.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Never underestimate a lioness when her pride is on the line.

Ashes of Outland.name: Nightshade Matron
Ashes of Outland.text: Rush Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

Ashes of Outland.name: Overgrowth
Ashes of Outland.text: Gain two empty Mana_Crystals.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

Ashes of Outland.name: Replicat-o-tron
Ashes of Outland.text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Rustsworn Cultist
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Demon."
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

Ashes of Outland.name: Scrap Shot
Ashes of Outland.text:
Deal $3 damage.
Give a random Beast in_your hand +3/+3.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Make your foe's armor your fauna's fashion!

Ashes of Outland.name: The Dark Portal
Ashes of Outland.text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

Ashes of Outland.name: Torrent
Ashes of Outland.text:
[x]Deal $8 damage to a
minion. Costs (3) less if
you cast a spell last turn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

Ashes of Outland.name: Vivid Spores
Ashes of Outland.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

Ashes of Outland.name: Al'ar
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Week #679: Still no mount...

Ashes of Outland.name: Aldor Truthseeker
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It’s under 'T.'

Ashes of Outland.name: Apexis Blast
Ashes of Outland.text:
Deal $5 damage.
If your deck has no minions, summon a random 5-Cost minion.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Lonely mages can still have a blast!

Ashes of Outland.name: Boggspine Knuckles
Ashes of Outland.text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

Ashes of Outland.name: Glowfly Swarm
Ashes of Outland.text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your_hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

Ashes of Outland.name: Imprisoned Antaen
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Can I get a pair of size XXXXXL manacles?

Ashes of Outland.name: Libram of Justice
Ashes of Outland.text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

Ashes of Outland.name: Psyche Split
Ashes of Outland.text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

Ashes of Outland.name: Ruststeed Raider
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt, Rush Battlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

Ashes of Outland.name: Scrap Golem
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

Ashes of Outland.name: Shattered Rumbler
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

Ashes of Outland.name: Warglaives of Azzinoth
Ashes of Outland.text: After attacking a minion, your hero may attack again.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: The blades glow green from things unseen, dark dreams whirling in the felfire gleam.

Ashes of Outland.name: Waste Warden
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Recycle that can, or you get the cuffs!

Ashes of Outland.name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "I will find you, sky!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Fel Summoner
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Demon from your_hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: All's well that ends fel when the fel summoner summons well.

Ashes of Outland.name: Hand of Gul'dan
Ashes of Outland.text:
When you play
or discard this,
draw 3 cards.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

Ashes of Outland.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
Ashes of Outland.text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
Ashes of Outland.flavor: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”
Ashes of Outland.howToGetGold: Earnable through Trial by Felfire Challenges.

Ashes of Outland.name: Keli'dan the Breaker
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. If drawn this turn, instead destroy all minions except this one.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: He calms down a lot if you just give him a turn.

Ashes of Outland.name: Scavenging Shivarra
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among all_other minions.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Say what you want but finding a matching set of six swords takes commitment.

Ashes of Outland.name: Skull of Gul'dan
Ashes of Outland.text: Draw 3 cards. Outcast: Reduce their Cost by (3).
Ashes of Outland.flavor: A fellow of evil possessed, of most devious shadow. He hath turned on his kin a thousand times, and now, how abhorred in all imagination he is!

Ashes of Outland.name: The Lurker Below
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Bloodboil Brute
Ashes of Outland.text: Rush Costs (1) less for each damaged minion.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Call Gurtogg a brute if you like, but no one else cares about the wounded like he does.

Ashes of Outland.name: Bonechewer Vanguard
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

Ashes of Outland.name: Cursed Vagrant
Ashes of Outland.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/5 Shadow with Stealth.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Little did he know… it was really the talbuk leg that was cursed.

Ashes of Outland.name: Lady Liadrin
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each spell you cast on friendly characters this game to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

Ashes of Outland.name: Marsh Hydra
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Rush After this attacks, add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

Ashes of Outland.name: Priestess of Fury
Ashes of Outland.text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

Ashes of Outland.name: Skeletal Dragon
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, add a Dragon to your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

Ashes of Outland.name: Soul Mirror
Ashes of Outland.text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: It’s a doppelgang-war!

Ashes of Outland.name: Beastmaster Leoroxx
Ashes of Outland.text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Beasts from your hand.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Father of Rexxar, Champion of the Horde, and Flexxar, Champion of the Gym.

Ashes of Outland.name: Coilfang Warlord
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 5/9 Warlord with Taunt.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Prepare for the staunch conch launch!

Ashes of Outland.name: Deep Freeze
Ashes of Outland.text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Enhanced Dreadlord
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

Ashes of Outland.name: Supreme Abyssal
Ashes of Outland.text: Can't attack heroes.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Yet, you still feel attacked.

Ashes of Outland.name: Libram of Hope
Ashes of Outland.text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and_Divine Shield.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Pit Commander
Ashes of Outland.text: Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a Demon from your deck.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: "Pit! Do as I say!"

Ashes of Outland.name: Ysiel Windsinger
Ashes of Outland.text: Your spells cost (1).
Ashes of Outland.flavor:
Reach down into your lungs. The wind that resides there is your greatest treasure. It provides the gift of song, which is free. 
*But not less than (1)

Ashes of Outland.name: Nagrand Slam
Ashes of Outland.text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

Ashes of Outland.name: Scrapyard Colossus
Ashes of Outland.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossus with Taunt.
Ashes of Outland.flavor: Heap on heapin' on.
